title: AI  Engineering intern
description:
Role: Gen AI Engineer Intern (Leading to PPO)
   

  

 Education: B.E./B.Tech (CSE/IT), MCA, or M.Sc. IT
   

  

 Focus: Building, fine\\-tuning, and deploying Generative AI solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* LLM Implementation: Work with frameworks like LangChain, LlamaIndex, or AutoGPT to build AI agents.
* RAG Pipelines: Develop Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems using Vector Databases (Pinecone, ChromaDB, or Weaviate).
* Prompt Engineering: Design and optimize prompts to improve model accuracy and reduce "hallucinations."
* API Integration: Integrate LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, or Open Source models via HuggingFace) into our core software products.
* Testing \\& Evaluation: Use frameworks to evaluate the performance and safety of AI outputs.


**Required Skills**
* Advanced Python: Strong coding skills in Python (Data structures, AsyncIO, and Classes).
* AI Knowledge: Understanding of Transformers, Embeddings, and Tokenization.
* APIs: Experience working with RESTful APIs and JSON data.
* Problem Solver: Ability to research the latest AI research papers and implement them practically.


**Note:** 
 This is a unpaid internship.Skills: api,advanced,python,research,framework

title: Junior Software Engineer (Python/React) - On-site, Pune
description:
**Company Description** 




 At Turtle Software Pvt. Ltd., we're not just building software; we're building the future for India's Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs). Our mission is to engineer a paradigm shift in the business software domain by leveraging the power of Artificial Intelligence. We create intelligent, intuitive, and impactful products that empower millions of businesses to optimize their operations, drive growth, and thrive in a competitive landscape. Backed by Google Cloud for Startups and proud build partners with Google.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 We are seeking a motivated Junior Software Engineer (Python/React) for a full\\-time, on\\-site role at our Pune office. The responsibilities for this role include developing, testing, and deploying features for our AI\\-powered SaaS platform. The engineer will work on front\\-end (React) and back\\-end (Python) development, collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate features seamlessly, and address technical challenges. Additional tasks involve maintaining code quality, debugging, and contributing to continuous improvements in functionality and efficiency within an agile development environment.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles, including algorithms, data structures, and problem\\-solving techniques.
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development using frameworks and technologies like Python and React.
* Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills with attention to detail and best coding practices.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies and a collaborative mindset to work effectively in a team environment.
* Bachelor‚Äôs/Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is required.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as Google Cloud or knowledge of SaaS applications is an added advantage.

description:
**Founding Web Developer** 




**Location:** 
 Indore (on\\-site)
 



**Engagement:** 
 Equity\\-Only
 



  





**About IIMaspirant.in** 




 IIMaspirant.in is developing a
 **technology\\-driven education platform** 
 for CAT and IPMAT aspirants emphasizing structure, consistency and measurable outcomes. Currently in the execution phase, we are assembling a
 **small but highly\\-ownership\\-oriented founding team** 
 .
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 This is a founding leadership role that grants you complete ownership of the technology and product execution. You‚Äôll collaborate directly with the Founder to build and expand the platform from the very beginning.
 



  





 During
 **the initial phase, this working will be equity\\-only** 
 . Our objective is to develop a standalone LMS (Learner Management System).
 



  





**Core Responsibilities** 



* Own and oversee the
 **entire technology stack**
* Develop, manage, and scale the
 **WordPress\\-based platform** 
 (mandatory)
* Design and implement the
 **LMS and mock test infrastructure**
* Make critical
 **build versus buy** 
 decisions
* Ensure performance, security, and scalability
* Translate product vision into a clear technical roadmap
* Establish engineering workflows and documentation
* Hire and lead future tech team members



  





**Requirements** 



* Strong, hands\\-on experience with
 **WordPress** 
 (non\\-negotiable)
* Solid understanding of modern web technologies and system design
* Experience in startups or product\\-driven environments is preferred
* Ownership mindset; comfortable with ambiguity
* Willingness to work
 **without a salary initially** 
 , for equity upside
* Ability to collaborate in a
 **hybrid setup (Indore preferred)**



  





**Equity \\& Structure** 



* Open to
 **with investment**
* Compensation to evolve with revenue milestones



  





**Who This Is For** 



* Builders who seek
 **ownership, not just tasks**
* Engineers aiming for a
 **founding leadership role**
* Individuals motivated by long\\-term value creation



 ¬†
 **Not suitable for candidates seeking immediate salary or short\\-term engagements.**

title: AI/ML Product Technologies Lead
description:
**Our Story** 




 Blue Star is India's leading Heating, Ventilation, Air conditioning and Commercial Refrigeration (HVAC\\&R) Company, with an annual revenue of over Rs 8000 crores, a network of 30 offices, 7 modern manufacturing facilities including the new state\\-of\\-the\\-art deep freezer facility at Wada, and Blue Star Climatech Limited‚Äôs world\\-class facility at Sri City; 3132 employees, and 4040 channel partners. The Company has manufacturing facilities at Dadra, Himachal Pradesh, Wada and Ahmedabad, which use modern, state\\-of\\-the\\-art manufacturing equipment to ensure that the products have consistent quality and reliability. The Company has a manufacturing footprint of more than 1 lakh sq m, with the mainstay of product development and R\\&D being energy\\-efficiency, coupled with eco\\-friendly and sustainable products.
 



  





**What Your Role Entails** 




  





 The Head of AI/ML Products Technologies is a strategic technology leadership role accountable for pioneering the adoption and industrialization of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning across the HVAC \\& Refrigeration business. Reporting directly to the Group CTO, this leader will architect the next generation of intelligent systems, driving R\\&D acceleration and enhancing core product performance through advanced algorithms.
 



 The mandate is to build a robust, scalable AI ML \\& IoT platform that maximizes energy efficiency, enables predictive maintenance, and creates a competitive advantage in the smart connected product market.
 



  





**What You‚Äôll Do:** 



* Define the long\\-term vision and technical roadmap for AI/ML adoption, ensuring alignment with the Organisation \\& R\\&D strategic goals.
* Lead the deployment of IoT and AIML integrated technology solutions that enhance product value through predictive analytic insights.
* Stimulate technology evaluation and Proof of Concept (POC) initiatives that accelerate R\\&D cycles and bring competitive advantage.
* Design and specify the Embedded Products Software Architecture, including the selection of Wireless Technologies and Connectivity Protocols to support the AI/ML strategy.
* Oversee the implementation of MLOps for continuous delivery and automation pipelines, ensuring AI models are reliably deployed and managed.
* Instil a NPD quality focus by steering Design FMEA and Software FMEA at the initial stage for all critical AI/ML features as part of the new product development process.
* Guide AI quality governance improvements through methodical identification of process gaps and lead efforts to bridge these gaps for internal and external customers.
* Recruit, mentor, and lead high\\-performing teams of Data Scientists and ML Engineers, effectively building a high\\-caliber AI/ML team from scratch.
* Lead technical initiatives and capability\\-building sessions that allow opportunities to upskill the technical team and ensure they perform at their full potential.
* Ensure that processes are in place to achieve 100% functional specification traceability for new AI\\-enabled features.
* Lead interactions with chip manufacturers and digital infrastructure vendors (ie. cloud storage)



  





**Your success is grounded in** 




  




* **Education:** 
 B.E/B.Tech/M.E/M.Tech \\- Electronics/ Electrical/Instrumentation
* 20\\+ years of professional experience demonstrating technical leadership in building technology platforms and executing embedded product design.
* Understanding \\& knowledge of various commercial and residential HVAC \\& Refrigeration systems.
* Domain Alignment: Proven experience in embedded product development, specifically for Smart meters or Smart thermostat products for the residential HVAC system.
* Possesses complete knowledge of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning methods required to realize high\\-value edge computing solutions.
* Expertise in data science methodologies, data analytics for deriving actionable insights, and developing complex algorithms for optimization and prediction.
* Strong understanding of MLOps for continuous delivery and the automation pipeline.
* Deep technical knowledge of Embedded Software architecture, design, and operating systems like RTOS (ThreadX, FreeRTOS).
* Connectivity expertise in Wireless Technologies (Wi\\-Fi, BLE, CHIP) and Connectivity Protocols (REST, MQTT).
* Proficiency in leveraging Edge and Cloud processing architectures to balance latency, cost, and computational demands of AI/ML models.
* Experience with AI/ML\\-enabled processor chips (e.g., dedicated NPUs or accelerators) to optimize model performance, power consumption, and security on embedded devices.
* Strong technical foundation in developing and integrating seamless consumer interfaces (UI/UX) for smart products and associated mobile/web applications.
* Comprehensive knowledge of security protocols and best practices (e.g., encryption, secure boot, key management) for embedded, cloud, and IoT communication.
* History of technical leadership, including holding patents or other publications related to the domain (e.g., Power savings for wireless sensors).
* Conversant with quality processes such as Design FMEA and Software FMEA



  





 Interested candidates can also drop your resume to
 **randdrecruiter@bluestarindia.com**
 with the brief on the projects worked.
 



  





**Where you‚Äôll be** 




  





 This role is based in Kapurbawdi, Thane.
 



  





 At Blue Star, you are not just another employee; you're part of a vibrant community that values innovation, dedication, and teamwork. We believe in investing in our people and providing opportunities for professional growth and development. You‚Äôll be empowered to take ownership of your role and make a difference in the lives of our customers and colleagues. If you‚Äôre ready to take on this exciting challenge and make a real impact, we would love to hear from you!

title: Okta CIAM Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**
 We are seeking an experienced
 **Okta CIAM Engineer** 
 to design, implement, and manage customer identity and access management (CIAM) solutions using Okta. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience in integrating Okta CIAM with various applications, ensuring secure, seamless, and scalable authentication and authorization processes for external users.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, configure, and deploy Okta Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) solutions.
* Implement and manage SSO (Single Sign\\-On), MFA (Multi\\-Factor Authentication), and user lifecycle management for customer\\-facing applications.
* Develop and maintain custom identity workflows, leveraging Okta APIs, SDKs, and integration tools.
* Work with OAuth 2\\.0, OpenID Connect (OIDC), and SAML protocols for authentication and federation.
* Collaborate with development and security teams to implement secure authentication mechanisms and ensure compliance with organizational standards.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex identity, access, and authentication issues.
* Participate in architecture reviews and recommend improvements for scalability, performance, and security.
* Maintain proper documentation for configurations, integrations, and best practices.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Minimum 7 years of experience in Identity and Access Management (IAM), with at least 3\\+ years in Okta CIAM.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Okta Workforce and Customer Identity Cloud (Auth0\\) is a plus.
* Expertise in authentication, authorization, and federation protocols (OAuth 2\\.0, OIDC, SAML).
* Experience in API integrations and custom identity flow development.
* Knowledge of directory services (AD/LDAP), RESTful APIs, and JSON\\-based tokens.
* Strong troubleshooting and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and documentation skills.

title: Senior Technical Lead ‚Äì Node.js | Microservices | Azure Cloud
description:

 IByte Technology Solutions goes beyond traditional software development and consulting services. Alongside delivering innovative technological solutions, the company excels in talent acquisition and resource supply, ensuring clients access top\\-tier industry experts. Their focus on excellence highlights the importance of assembling the right team to drive exceptional project outcomes. By blending expertise in software development and talent sourcing, IByte Technology Solutions positions itself as a leader in delivering value\\-driven solutions.
 



**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time Principal Engineer ‚Äì Platform \\& Distributed Systems role located on\\-site in WP, Kuala Lumpur. The role involves leading the design, development, and deployment of scalable distributed systems, coaching and mentoring junior engineers, and developing technical strategies to address complex engineering challenges. The Principal Engineer will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to ensure the performance, reliability, and scalability of the platform. Additionally, the candidate will drive innovation and maintain best practices within the organization.
 



**Qualifications** 




 Strong experience with Node.js, NestJs framework, Typescript, Cloud technologies and
 



 Distributed Systems.

 SAGA, event sourcing, CQRS, Kafka streaming.

 a focus on Azure Cloud, GitHub, Docker, and Kubernetes, is required.¬†

title: Senior .NET Lead IRC282959
description:
